name: Vegetarian Alliance | 素食联盟 |Вегетарианский Альянс
name_original: Vegetarian Alliance | 素食联盟 |Вегетарианский Альянс
description:
1 simple sentence to summarize the game:

This is a relaxed action-adventure game that uses the characters to perform a game that eliminates meat monsters and wins the final victory.

2 About this game:

The Vegetarian Alliance is a mysterious organization. Legend has it that a group of people have been eaten by meat because they ate too much meat. They can only resist the invasion of meat by continuing to be vegetarian. In order to survive, we must be vegetarian!

3 game introduction:

This is probably the adventure game you have ever played the longest knowledge.

You help the character to beat the meat in the level by up, down, left and right operations, and get vegetables to replenish energy.
At the same time, the game also has different grades of meat and vegetables waiting for you to challenge and absorb. Different vegetables will get different energy. When you have a superman stunt, don't join us and challenge the greasy fat to win. !

4 game features

Do you want to know that every bite of crispy fried chicken hides the hazard?
Do you want to know how much burden your body will bring to your body?
The game links are layered together, and a series of game experiences let you be there.
The game produces vivid images, with annoying pork belly, fried chicken and big chicken legs, as well as carrots, greens and other foods that we love. These images are both lively and cute, and people can't stop playing.
The Vegetarian Alliance makes you a healthy vegetarian!

While playing the game, you can learn the little knowledge about healthy eating and philosophy of life. It is a small game to relax your body and mind.

It is better to eat medicine to make up the body than to eat medicine. When you play the game, don't forget to eat more vegetarian food! Be careful to eat it with braised pork!
